name: unwritten
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
Something that is unwritten does not exist in a written or printed form: an unwritten constitution
An unwritten rule or law does not exist officially but people generally accept and obey it: There's an unwritten rule that you don't wear jeans to work.

not written
An unwritten law/rule is one that does not exist officially, but which people generally accept and obey: There’s an unwritten rule at work that you don’t wear jeans.
